text: 44:30 2 Atriviba 25:1-7Bizir kɨ ia damuamim a kamakɨn, Isipɨn Atrivim Hofra, kɨ a isɨ apanir a mɨsueghtɨ ana aremeghamimɨn dafarim darɨgham. Arazir kamra, kɨ faragha Judan Atrivim Sedekaia gami. Babilonɨn Atrivim Nebukatnesar Sedekaian apanim gami, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghasa, kɨ a isa Nebukatnesar ganɨngi.”44:30 Jeremaian eghaghanim, a sapta 44ɨn gɨfa. Dughiar kamɨn, Jeremaia Isipɨn kantrin ikia egha ghurigha gɨfa. Ezɨ fofozir gumaziba ghaze Jeremaia Isipɨn kantrin ikia ghua areme.
